body_html:
In case anyone has the same problem: tensorflow supports CUDA 8.0, if you build it from sources (and configure accordingly).
The following post worked for me: https://alliseesolutions.wordpress.com/2016/09/08/install-gpu-tensorflow-from-sources-w-ubuntu-16-04-and-cuda-8-0-rc/

The issue is therefore: support CUDA 8.0 out of the box, because it is the primary CUDA version now.

body:
In case anyone has the same problem: tensorflow supports CUDA 8.0, if you build it from sources (and configure accordingly).
The following post worked for me: https://alliseesolutions.wordpress.com/2016/09/08/install-gpu-tensorflow-from-sources-w-ubuntu-16-04-and-cuda-8-0-rc/

The issue is therefore: support CUDA 8.0 out of the box, because it is the primary CUDA version now.
